column7: Always/Globally check respone for excepted result
column24: each dropping request should be intrinsically have a set of expected results; the result (which always must be a JSON, hence array) could be checked with #31277.

you have not finished the flow3-renaming properly ;)

The condition at TYPO3\ElasticSearch\Package:36 will never return true and thus prepareRealtimeIndexing() is never executed. Just rename typo3.flow3:persistence into typo3.flow:persistence.

btw: great work!

Currently the implementation doesn't support property with type array. I have a small path to add a transformer class to cast collection objects to string. A small modification need to be done in the objectIndexActionRequired, because array_diff_assoc is used to compare the two array. This function has no support for multi dimensional array

column7: Add a basic repository and query support
column24: Currently the query on ElasticSearch indexes don't use a repository like API. I propose to add a query object and a basic repository, to offer a more Flow style experience.
Currently the ElasticSearch don't consider the policy.yaml
